showerReviews.reviewText: … the love in the kitchen that makes all the difference when you receive your plate at the table.  I strongly encourage you to stop more often and turn your back on Love's Travel Stop.  I would like a shower service if possible in the future!
They have everything a trucker and car traffic needs  great food truck parking cat scales restrooms nice staff if they add in shower somewere id give them 5 stars but thats the only downside

showerReviews.reviewText: Came over from Asheville after the floods to take a shower.  First time using a Pilot facility for this purpose. Everyone was so kind and wonderful to us, including all the truckers in line.  The shower facilities were wonderful, very clean …

I took showers here for years. Today the shower was really cold. First time in 8 years. I returned to take another shower its still freezing. 1/13/2025 please fix your water heater. Do Not Shower Here

… ! The staff are friendly and very helpful. The toilets are very clean! The shower facilities are super clean and the shower itself is awesome! The subway and pizza place is great. Well stocked and well maintained all the way around. Safe …

Stopped for fuel and a shower. The showers were excellent very clean and well laid out. Hot water is hot very hot✔ limited parking. Getting in and out takes patience with local traffic. The rest of the store is very clean as well one of the …

An amazing Pilot! Aways friendly service and customer appreciation. It is a bit tight on parking for trucks. The fresh coffee and showers will make up for the difficulties you may encounter entering and exiting the parking lot. …

Fuel, Laundry, Shower. Staff are nice Showers are the best Ive EVER HAD at a Pilot. Not well water nor treated water. Pressure is like a car wash. Love it. Dunkin coffee here if your sick of the Pilot brand. Overall best TS in 26 years! Dam …

… time I am traveling I trust my snacking and fuel needs to Pilot. They also have a shower rewards system for Gasoline purchases and not just Diesel like their competition. I live on the road and love the ability to shower free with a …

… Fuel isles are full on geniuses who park there instead of pumping and go inside for lunch or shower.  Beware of pavement going in as it is bumpy, you go a bit faster - and you'll flip over, saw it already once. …

The absolute best handicapped shower I've been in in 6 months Extremely roomy water pressure awesome very clean well maintained I am one happy camper or should I say truck driver Friendly staff Clean restrooms I suggest if you got a park …
Best shower I've had in months!!! Brutally refreshing!! Great water pressure and super hot! Store has GREAT selection and full shelves!

showerReviews.reviewText: Not a lot of parking showers not great but it's a shower it's $8 for the shower plus $8 deposit you might want to bring your own towel not as good as the big truck stops but it works and the staff is nice when I went in there was two very …
… It looks like they have two showers, and I would bring my own towel if I was desperate enough to shower there. …
This is a smaller truck stop that fills quickly. The shower was pretty dirty and the cashiers talked on the phone the whole time I was waiting for towels and while they waited on customers.
Didn't shower or eat.... By the time I was able to actually find the place I was late for my drop. No signs or anything had to get directions from a local.
Polite & friendly staff and really clean shower . The towels looked and smelled very clean.
Good place for those who are traveling plus they have a laundry mat and shower
Clean shower nice staff
Very dirty bathroom and shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: A fabulous truck stop experience! Like any other Love's Travel Stop, there were a PLETHORA of both hot and cold food options for lunch, plenty of drinks to choose from, plenty of space in the bathroom, and lots of clothing and various …

Love's is isn't a Love's without Ms Hope in there. So grateful that I got to meet Ms Hope today. She was very upbeat, helpful, and busy keeping the store spotless. Now I didn't take a shower here, but I did do laundry, and used the …

This loves was fully stocked with food and supply. It was very clean plus people and environmental friendly.
customer service was very manerable and you can also tell that the employees are …

Usually trust Loves to be clean and orderly. I visited this location on 7/26/25 at about 5:45pm. First thing I saw was trash cans overflowing. They looked like they had not been emptied in days. There was trash in the parking lot. There …

This is a decent truck stop, it has a decent amount of parking for trucks. The restroom was clean, but the soap is scented. If you are sensitive to smells like I am the last thing you want is to be poisoned by scents. Overall a decent stop. No one was present at the counter, no greeting and scented soap lost a star.

The team at this Loves does an excellent job with keeping the facility and property at top tier condition. Store is clean and people are super friendly. I made several trips in side the store and each time I was impressed to see all …

Very new, very clean. Very convenient that they have a harddees attached. Very well lit. Not that I used it, but the dog park is a nice feature. Didn't have my exact flavor of dip, but had an acceptable substitute.  Staff was super helpful, nice and friendly. Very appreciated start to a long day.

showerReviews.reviewText: I regret not taking pictures.  I've showered in more truck stop showers than anyone should have too. …

I paid $17 for a low flow shower...I wish the executives would install low flow in their homes....DOUBLE CHARGE FOR EVERYTHING HIGHER FUEL PAY FOR PARKING AND CANT GET A DESCENT SHOWER.. .SAD TA

showerReviews.reviewText: 100 degrees , reserved a shower and there absolutely no cold water , is this a joke ?

… very slow I'm assuming they seen me looking at it then it started running properly after 3 dollars. Second thing I go in and get a shower it's $16.00!! That is robbery shower should be no more than 6 dollars from now on I will not stop here …

I was very impressed with the staff, facilities and services. The showers were comparable to a five star hotel. Had the nicest waitress. Parking lot was clean. I had been missing my ultra one card and the diesel desk clerk called in and …

… Cleanliness is critical right now. Nasty ladies room. Shower had fresh towels but wasn‘t cleaned properly, shaving cream over the wall, another yucky mirror. When I asked for a different shower, the employee said: „You mean the shower isn‘t …

… dirty, potato soup was a puree, food server forgot to put order in and I ran out of time so made it to go and she brought it on a plate....cold. convenience store and shower were 10/10. Parking lot clean, fuel islands clean and efficient.

Great place. I get there for shower and i was on rush and locked my truck keys,my wallet and my phone inside truck.i went to the shop and the front desk lady ANIE was very helpful. I'm glad she help me find someone to unlock my truck. Thank …

showerReviews.reviewText: … There are 2 showers for men and one for women. It’s $10 for a shower. The shower wasn’t the best, but it wasn’t terrible. The water got hot, the wash cloth was nice. It was reasonably clean. The water pressure was just ok. …

Store was stocked decently. Bathrooms just okay. Shower was in bathroom but decided not to shower. Sign said 10$/person. Red Dirt lot with some pot holes. Room for maybe 5-10 trucks if parked right. 3 big trucks were there. Utility trucks …

Not a pretty place but does have a clean bathroom with a shower and they do have a grill area with hot dogs and hamburgers and fries and fresh coffee. The burgers were great and fries too, definitely worth getting. Coffee was good.

You can tell at one point this was a mom and pop operation. However, if you need a quick shower and a place to park for the night, this is it. Staff is friendly but this place definitely could use a makeover. You can tell by the appearance …
Old facility operated by a nice Indian family. Outdated, needs a deep clean and parking lot is gravel - dirt $5 overnight parking,  shower $10

Place isn't new and fancy.  It is clean and the staff treated me very nice.  Laundry was a dollar to wash and a dollar to dry.  Shower was five dollars.  Old place but clean and people are very nice to customers.
It's just a old dirty truck stop,has everything you would need, if you HAVE to shower here I'd wear something on my feet...treat it as a jail shower if it even works
Nice little truckstop, $10 shower
Limited spots there shower too
Huge shower

showerReviews.reviewText: I regret not taking pictures.  I've showered in more truck stop showers than anyone should have too. …

Cleanest shower that I have been in in a VERY long time. The truckstop itself was clean inside and out. The bathroom was just as clean as the shower! "E" should be the National Standard for Travel Centers of America shower and restroom …
I paid $17 for a low flow shower...I wish the executives would install low flow in their homes....DOUBLE CHARGE FOR EVERYTHING HIGHER FUEL PAY FOR PARKING AND CANT GET A DESCENT SHOWER.. .SAD TA

showerReviews.reviewText: 100 degrees , reserved a shower and there absolutely no cold water , is this a joke ?

… very slow I'm assuming they seen me looking at it then it started running properly after 3 dollars. Second thing I go in and get a shower it's $16.00!! That is robbery shower should be no more than 6 dollars from now on I will not stop here …

I was very impressed with the staff, facilities and services. The showers were comparable to a five star hotel. Had the nicest waitress. Parking lot was clean. I had been missing my ultra one card and the diesel desk clerk called in and …

… Cleanliness is critical right now. Nasty ladies room. Shower had fresh towels but wasn‘t cleaned properly, shaving cream over the wall, another yucky mirror. When I asked for a different shower, the employee said: „You mean the shower isn‘t …

… dirty, potato soup was a puree, food server forgot to put order in and I ran out of time so made it to go and she brought it on a plate....cold. convenience store and shower were 10/10. Parking lot clean, fuel islands clean and efficient.

Great place. I get there for shower and i was on rush and locked my truck keys,my wallet and my phone inside truck.i went to the shop and the front desk lady ANIE was very helpful. I'm glad she help me find someone to unlock my truck. Thank …
